The multiplier per hit for this ability decreases as the number of enemies increases. The exact number is given by the following formula, where X is the number of alive enemies:

0.78+(1.29-0.78)*exp(-(X-1)*0.42)

This multiplier starts at 1.29 with only 1 enemy and is always higher than 0.78.

name: Valiant Strike
effects: Eight single attacks (1.00 each), ATK increases as HP decreases
effectsNote:
This ability essentially works like a normal physical attack, but applies one of the following multipliers to the user's ATK, depending on how much HP the user has:

- 100%~30% HP: (1/0.9) + (0.07/0.9)*((1-HP%)/0.7)
- 30%~20% HP: (1.07/0.9) + (0.05/0.9)*((0.3-HP%)/0.1)
- 20%~0% HP:  (1.13/0.9) + (0.37/0.9)*((0.2-HP%)/0.2)^1.5

This multiplier is always higher than 1.111 and is capped at 1.4, or ~10% HP.

effectsNote:
The multiplier per hit for this ability decreases as the number of enemies increases. The exact number is given by the following formula, where X is the number of alive enemies:

0.78+(1.29-0.78)*exp(-(X-1)*0.42)

This multiplier starts at 1.29 with only 1 enemy and is always higher than 0.78.

effects: Six group ranged attacks (0.78~1.29 each scaling with targets), causes [Imperil Dark 20%] for 25 seconds
effectsNote:
The multiplier per hit for this ability decreases as the number of enemies increases. The exact number is given by the following formula, where X is the number of alive enemies:

0.78+(1.29-0.78)*exp(-(X-1)*0.42)

This multiplier starts at 1.29 with only 1 enemy and is always higher than 0.78.

The multiplier for this attack is given by the following formula, where X is the number of Dark attacks used by the user:

(1/(1+exp(-X*(2/10)))*2-1)*3.3+11.20

The minimum multiplier is 11.20, and never goes higher than 14.50.

The multiplier for this attack is given by the following formula, where X is the number of hits taken by the user:

(1.49)*(1-exp(-0.055*X))+11.44

The minimum multiplier is 11.44, and never goes higher than 12.93.
